name: Caamanha
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots"

A top-down 2D horror game inspired by a brazilian indigenous folklore, with the same name as the game. 

Follow the paths of the forest, collect the resources before the bar drains out. Don't let it run out of resources or it's game over. 

Hint: you can save time by going out of the main path but be aware of Caamanha... Hide and don't let her get you! 

Controls: -> Move with W/A/S/D, use the mouse to look around and "M" to show the map.
